The majority of Bangladeshi News Paper are broadsheets, with only a few daily sensationalism. In Bangladesh, regular newspapers are issued in Dhaka, and also important regional towns including, Sylhet, Khulna, Barisal Rajshahi, and Chittagong. In Bangladesh, all local papers are morning publications; there are no evening versions. Softcopies of certain newspapers are available.
